import { Code } from 'astro-expressive-code/components'
export const getCode = (no) => `
// I'm code block #${no}
console.log('I ${no === 1 ? `should` : `should NOT`} have styles and scripts added');
`
export let blockNumber = 1

# Many code components in an MDX file

<Code code={getCode(blockNumber++)} lang="js" mark={2} meta="addStyles" />

<Code code={getCode(blockNumber++)} lang="js" mark={2} />

<Code code={getCode(blockNumber++)} lang="js" mark={2} />
